props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description:
기본값. 비제어 컴포넌트에서 사용
값이 `null`이면 탭이 선택되지 않습니다.

props.name: value
props.description:
현재 선택된 탭의 값. 제어 컴포넌트에서 사용
값이 `null`이면 탭이 선택되지 않습니다.

props.name: onValueChange
type: (value: any, eventDetails: { reason: "none"; event: Event; cancel: () => void; allowPropagation: () => void; isCanceled: boolean; isPropagationAllowed: boolean; } & { activationDirection: ActivationDirection; }) => void
props.description: 새 값이 설정될 때 호출되는 콜백

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
